headline: Here is Why First Solar (FSLR) Soared This Week
summary: The share price of First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) surged by 18.89% between June 26 and July 3, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Gained the Most This Week. First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) is a leading American solar technology company and global provider of responsibly produced, eco-efficient solar modules. The American solar energy industry, […]
